sentences.english: Do you want paper or plastic bags for your groceries?
sentences.chinese: 到他們當地的雜貨店時，用紙袋還是塑膠袋？

sentences.english: Most of the aromatherapy carrier oils you find in grocery stores are not cold-pressed .
sentences.chinese: 大部分的香薰油母你覺得不冷雜貨店喘不過氣來。

sentences.english: Even a simple pasta would work; buy dessert from the bakery in the grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 還可以從食品雜貨店的麪包房中買一些甜點。

sentences.english: Pretty soon you won't have the burden of making eye contact at the grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 很快地你將不負有舉證責任死死地盯着雜貨店。

sentences.english: In Europe the most pilfered grocery item is luxury cooked meat.
sentences.chinese: 在歐洲，最經常被偷的雜貨店商品是奢侈的熟肉製品。

sentences.english: I had a part-time job somewhere where I lived previously, at a grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 我之前在原來住的地方有份兼職工作，在一家雜貨店。

sentences.english: You can get the toasted coconut from Thai grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 烘椰肉可在泰國雜貨店購買。

sentences.english: I found these veggie bratwursts at one of my neighborhood grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 我發現我們社區的一家雜貨店裏有素食香腸。

sentences.english: I can go to the grocery store because, dammit, you just have to go sometime.
sentences.chinese: 我可以去雜貨店，因爲，見鬼，你有時就是要去一趟。

sentences.english: Purchase alum from any grocery store or pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 首先從食品雜貨店或者藥店買一些明礬。
他把他的雜貨店關閉了。

sentences.english: After retirement Mr. A works as a salesperson in a grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 先生退休後，在一家雜貨店當銷貨員。

sentences.english: I used an old curtain found at my favorite antique shop!
sentences.chinese: 我在最喜歡的復古雜貨店裏找到這塊舊窗簾布。

sentences.english: As we walked, I noticed a grocery store that appeared to be intact.
sentences.chinese: 路上我注意到一家食品雜貨店似乎完好無損。

sentences.english: The little grocery shop is losing all its customers to the new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 那個小雜貨店的顧客都跑到新開的超級市場上去了。

sentences.english: GROCERY】We buy our rice at the nearest grocery.
sentences.chinese: 我們在最近的一家食品雜貨店裏買米。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
